New Records: Lionel Messi set the record for the most minutes played in Copa América history during the match
Key Match Events: Argentina took a 1-0 lead before the break with Lisandro Martínez's header
Ecuador was awarded a penalty kick after Argentina was called for a handball in the box, but Enner Valencia missed it off the post
Ecuador scored a miraculous goal in extra time to keep its hopes alive
Pre-Game Insights: Argentina was favored to win based on its strong showing in the group stages
Argentina will face the winner of Canada vs. Venezuela in the semifinals
Post-Match Reflections: Argentina is making a strong case to defend its title after a win over a tough Ecuador team
Argentina could get a worthy opponent in either Canada or Venezuela
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was a defensive battle for most of the first half
The penalty shootout saw Argentina make four shots while Ecuador could only make two
Others: The upcoming schedule includes several knockout stage quarterfinal matches and semifinal matches
